description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. The apocalypse is here! City streets around your retirement village lie in ruin while zombies run amok! Only you... an 82 year-old ex-vietnam war-veteran with alzheimers and a heart condition is able to put a stop to the undead's reign of terror. Try not to soil your pants!
description.short: The apocalypse is here! City streets around your retirement village lie in ruin while zombies run amok! Only you... an 82 year-old ex-vietnam war-veteran with alzheimers and a heart condition is able to put a stop to the undead's reign of terror. Try not to soil your pants!
